articles.description: Government will sell a 16.12% stake in Tata Communications through an offer-for-sale. The remaining shares will be sold to Tata Sons Pvt.’s investment arm Panatone Finvest
articles.content: The Indian government will exit its entire 26.12% shareholding in Tata Communications Ltd., the company said in a regulatory filing late Friday.
